name: ITP - C1603A - Waikare Gorge Descent - Groundbeam & Guardrail
template name: ITP - C1603A - Waikare Gorge Descent - Groundbeam & Guardrail

name: Detail - Documentation from the supplier that proves the safety complies with Section 5 of the project Specification
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - Section 5 of the Project Specification
Detail - Earthworks and pavement construction shall be completed prior to Ground beam and Barrier installation.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Review
Detail - All reinforcing steel to comply with AS/NZS 4671 Grade 500E
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - DH16, DH12, RH12 reinforcing steel delivered and dockets collected
Records - Delivery dockets, packing slips, invoices
Detail - Concrete mix to meet required strength
Frequency - Three weeks prior to placement of concrete
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - Minimum concrete compressive strength to be 30 MPa at 28 days
Detail - All rolls bar codes are to be collected and attached to the rest of the QA Documentation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Compliant with Tensar Triax TX160 or equivalent
Records - Delivery dockets, packing slips, invoices
Detail - Documentation from the supplier that proves the safety complies with Section 5 of the project Specification
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - Section 5 of the Project Specification
Detail - Reinforcing steel to have minimum 50mm cover
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Reinforcing steel placed as per design. No concrete to be poured until formwork and reinforcement approved by CPS Engineer
Records - CS-4040 Concrete Inspection Record, Photos
Detail - Cast-in bracket as per NZTA B5
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - As per design, Concrete dispatch dockets
Records - CS-4040. Concrete Inspection Record, Photos
Detail - Compression Testing - Coring > 20 hours after placing - 75mm minimum dimension of the cores. Concrete slump and spread test reports.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - 1.9m wide strip laid evenly across beam and adjacent ground
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Geogrid at minimum 65mm above top of ground beam
Detail - Install guardrail as per contractors methodology
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Nominally max 3 days, once concrete is hard enough. TBC with the guardrail contractor.
Detail - Inspection of constructed safety barrier to confirm compliance with NZTA M23 and the IFC Drawings
Frequency - At completion of Safety Barrier Installation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - The final walkover must be scheduled at least one week before the site's completion or demobilisation.
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work

Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Walkover must be attended by Handover, Quality, CPS & Construction (other parties might be invited e.g. Resource consent close out)
Conformance Criteria - Completed report with Snag List
Records - Snag List signed by attendees
Detail - Red pen mark-up drawings are to be included in the QA file. A survey as-built of completed work must be provided.
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings, Survey as-built
Conformance Criteria - All RFI, NCRs and site changes must be recorded. Signed and dated.
Detail - Redline mark-up drawings are to be reviewed and accepted by CPS. All NCRs and RFIs are closed and included with the Handover QA file.
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work

Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
Detail - Signoffs by Project Manager, Quality Manager, CPS Manager
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work

Conformance Criteria - Ensure all parties have signed and approved ITP
